about_the_game:
give the world shape.
sb studio invites you to create your own society in the chaos of excitement and change.balance the conflicting interests in the world and get the position you deserve.
economy and society simulation:
Detailed population groups with their own economic needs and political aspirations.Research transformative new technologies or ideas to improve the national situation.
DEEP ECONOMIC SYSTEM:
Grow your industry to take advantage of lucrative goods and tax profits to increase national prosperity.create new companies and have a say in the world .
dominate the world in the economy with your national currency.buy and sell raw materials from the international stock exchange.establish common economic markets with friendly countries.
diplomacy:
Increase your economic and military power, even at the expense of acquiring competitors.
well-being score:
keep the welfare of the people as high as possible.for this, buy or produce products that give prosperity points.if you manage to become the most prosperous country for a long time,victory is yours...

name: strategy battles​

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: strategy battles is a real time strategy game.it has many fields such as diplomacy, military and science.but the economy has a weighted mechanics..build cars, chemical factories..you can sell or import your products.you can use many more methods for the welfare of the people.
